name: Controlled useState
description: Random quote display with no immediate repeats and view count tracking using controlled components with useState and useEffect hooks
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage current quote index, view counts array, and viewed quotes set. Implements random selection with exclusion logic and view count tracking. Provides console logging of quote indices and comprehensive statistics.
features: Random quote selection with no immediate repeats
View count tracking for each quote
Console logging in format: 'Quote: i' where i is index
Most viewed quote highlighting with badges
Comprehensive statistics (total views, average, unique viewed)
Bootstrap card and list group styling
Button state management (disabled for single quote)
Quote preview in list (truncated for readability)
